text: John Lewis Brown (23 March 1921 – 10 January 1989) was an English professional footballer who played as a full-back in the Football League for York City, and in non-League football for Stanley United and York Civil Service. ==References== Category:1921 births Category:People from Crook, County Durham Category:Footballers from County Durham Category:1989 deaths Category:English footballers Category:Association football fullbacks Category:Stanley United F.C. players Category:York City F.C. players Category:English Football League players
title: John Brown (footballer, born 1921)
